authors.name: Jong Kook Rhim
authors.affiliation: College of Medicine, Jeju National University

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"b42hg","text":"As the number of COVID-19 vaccines increases, reports of complications are also increasing. In particular, when cerebral hemorrhage occurs, the prognosis is poor. Here, we aimed to investigating the clinical course of patients who developed intracerebral hemorrhage after COVID-19 vaccination and the patient prognosis through a systematic review.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hq2q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"arrlf","text":"As coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) hit the world like never before, there were 244,105,621 infection cases and 4,959,347 deaths worldwide as of October 24, 2021. As the number of vaccination increases, reports of death and serious adverse reactions after vaccination are also increasing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We are still developing and optimizing this protocol

{"blocks":[{"key":"3rrbr","text":"Condition or domain being studied","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f29f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8tb20","text":"As the number of COVID-19 vaccines increases, reports of complications are also increasing. In particular, when cerebral hemorrhage occurs, the prognosis is poor. Here, we aimed to investigating the clinical course of patients who developed intracerebral hemorrhage after COVID-19 vaccination and the patient prognosis through a systematic review.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bljo3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5li","text":"As coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) hit the world like never before, there were 244,105,621 infection cases and 4, 959,347 deaths worldwide as of October 24, 2021. As the number of vaccination increases, reports of death and serious adverse reactions after vaccination are also increasing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"b3hb4","text":"Participants/population","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":23}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7dpo4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fbbto","text":"Specify the participants or populations being studied in the review. The preferred format includes details of both inclusion and exclusion criteria.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"auvl7","text":"Inclusion criteria (Pai 2021):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"abe55","text":"1. A patient who visited the hospital for ICH after receiving COVID-19 vaccine","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ebla","text":"2. ICH that occurred within 28 days after vaccination","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"93ei","text":"3. Spontaneous cerebral hemorrhage
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jr3g","text":"Exclusion criteria:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"73s5j","text":"1. ICH after COVID-19 infection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84lvr","text":"2. Patients with ICH without prior history of COVID-19 vaccination","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"etu7c","text":"3. ICH that are caused by after traumatic brain injury","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5k1bo","text":"4. ICH that occurred beyond 28 days after vaccination
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48g26","text":"Definitions:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"60g38","text":"1. COVID-19 vaccine:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"l7jh","text":"- ChAdOx1 nCoV-20' (AZ),","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6e8qu","text":"- mRNA (Pfizer and Moderna),","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q3gi","text":"- Ad26.COV2.S (Johnson & Johnson)
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1m1h8","text":"2. Intracerebral hemorrhage (ICH) was defined as hemorrhage in cerebrum as the predominate lesion. Those with concomitant SAH were included in this study. However, pure SAH alone was not included in this study.
","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5jl6e","text":"3. COVID-19 infection: diagnosed by any means as reported.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fu93q","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84b27","text":"References:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5nei1","text":"Pai M, et al. Vaccine-induced prothrombotic immune thrombocytopenia VIPIT following AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccination: interim guidance for healthcare professionals in emergency department and inpatient setting. Science Brief of the Ontario COVID-19 Science Advisory Table. 2021;1(21).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c06uo","text":"Intervention(s), exposure(s)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gati","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"84eah","text":"There is no designated intervention or exposure in this study because the aim of this review is narrative outcome data.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
